name: Megatroid! (Full Game)
description:
For best performance, download the game and use a joystick.

Controls:

Arrow Keys: Move

Right Shift Key = Pause and Menu Select

F Key = Jump

D Key = Shoot

Thank you for your donation! Evil Dr. Wily is at it again. This time he has taken things too far. Very far... all the way to Planet Zebes! Megaman can't do conquer this challenge alone, so he has enlisted the help of Megamo and Carokinu. It's Megaman in the world of Metroid, with explorable areas, unique bosses, and powerful upgrades.  Megatroid! Pesented by Quoise Games. Enjoy!
